sect1.title: Data Source
sect1.para: This filter allows users to change the visibility of concepts belonging to a particular data source.

After applying the Data Source Filter, all the concepts which had been integrated from "GO:TAIR:UNIPROTKB" are made invisible. Some of the Biological Process GO concepts within this network then disappear. (To delete invisible concepts/relations from the network, please use Edit -> Delete Hidden Items)
